title: Downton Abbey Season 3 S03+ Extras (1080p Bluray x265 HEVC AAC 2
description:
Downton Abbey Season 3 S03+ Extras (1080p Bluray x265 HEVC AAC 2ch Joy)[UTR]




A x265/HEVC Player is a REQUIREMENT for this Torrent!

 If you like it, put a seed on it!
image


 Downton Abbey Season 3, in 1080p in x265 aka HEVC and HE-AAC 2ch audio all for about 446mb each!
 Encoded using the time consuming 2 pass, from the Blu-ray source, for the highest quality possible. 
 The Blu-ray is presented in 1080i, so I ran a decomb filter on it for better presentation on modern displays.

*Making encodes from physical blu-rays is actually harder than one would think. None of the files are labeled and I am left to figure out which file is which episode. For the others I downloaded other versions and did scene compares to check episode titles. I could not find one for season 3. All the episodes are here, they just may not be correctly labeled. If this is to much risk for you, don't download and save your self the complaining later. Thank you.

 Just to clear up any confusion folks might have regarding filenames: 
 * S03E01 is actually an introductory feature with story recaps, cast interviews, etc. (I think PBS probably aired it the week prior to showing season 3.) 
 * S03E02-S03E09 are episodes 1-8 for Season 3. 
 * S03E10 is the Christmas special for Season 3. 
 * S03E11 is actually the Christmas special for Season 2
